website_summaries.verdict: This heater must be mounted to your wall or ceiling, but it is great for providing instant, direct heat.
pros: Life span estimated at 5,000 to 5,500 hours
cons: you must find a place to mount it

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Heater
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little heater! Keep our dogs nice and warm in their outdoor pen! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my storage shed ! And it does come with a remote!
customer_reviews.author: Ed B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This heater was extremely easy to mount and is able to rotate on the mount. It puts out much more heat than I was expecting. I use it on my 7x10 patio with 2 walls being screens and it keeps me warm. (I also did put in vinyl on one screen to keep the wind and rain out.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bradley

customer_reviews.title: update- wiring shortage
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but- I set the timer and it never shuts off Update: has a wiring shortage and turns on and off on its own, power shuts off and comes on.. only way to make sure it’s off is to unplug it. In my photo you can see it’s on but the light is off and unresponsive to the remote. Can’t get it to stay on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon253

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: Does great job heating personal space on screened porch in Central Florida. Liked first heater so much, purchased 2nd heater for outdoor work area. 2nd heater came with a remote that worked only 2 of 3 heat settings. Customer service promptly sent new remote which is working perfect. We haven't noticed any increase in our electric bill, another huge plus. Excellent product, excellent customer service. Recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Red Ribbon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the job is designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Got it mainly to help prevent freezing for some plants we had outdoors and it works great for it (we live in South Florida, it may not be enough if you live more up north). We're using it in a semi-enclosed 8x16 area and it worked well for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Good heater that is worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I live in a condo by the beach and in the morning I would have this turned on and see the sunrise. When I turn this on it warms the balcony up and I don’t have to feel the cold air since it’s getting chilly outside now. It was such a great deal:)
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: 100 percent happy!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is not very big but! It puts out major heat. Contrary to the instructions I mounted this on the ceiling pointed down on my work bench, with the three power settings this heater is perfect. When I bought mine no where in the add said it comes with a remote and it did! I was pleasently suprised. The timer function works perfectly 1-24 hours. So, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: greg myers

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This unit puts off heat but really designed for a small 10x10 room. We put ours outside in a covered screen patio it's decent but for our patio probably need a second or third one to really enjoy the outdoors. Giving this a 3 because we thought it would be just a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The heater is very lightweight ,and very hot
customer_reviews.text: The heater is very lightweight, and the cord is very thick. They advise against using extension cords, and also say to not move the heater once it is on because it is so hot, but when you plug it in even a tiny pull on the cord makes the heater slide around, so be careful with it. Remember to fasten it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Crystalye

customer_reviews.title: These heaters are excellent heat sources!!!
customer_reviews.text: These heaters really put off the heat!!! Once I figured out how to cut them on, instructions are vague or were not for this particular product. But, that was the only problem I had with these. They only work with the remote, there is no on/off switch on the unit itself. Make sure you don't lose the remote!!!😁 Overall, very good heaters!!! Definitely glad I purchased these heaters!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater if it doesn't come with damage or have to dismantle it
customer_reviews.text: Heater works great, but not impressed with packaging. Right out of the package the black end pieces are cracked. (Dont care, it's just for garage) The heater screws are just thrown into bag with heater. I had to take apart the heater to remove 2 of the screws that were stuck inside. If you need installation instructions dont rely on the manual. Pretty vague. The angled safety protections seems to work ok. I tried turning it on at an angle to see if it worked after I found the damage. Overall it is a nice heater. I would buy again, but if it comes damaged next time I'll send it right back
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: 👍Installed a week ago, is On All Day & So far so good 😅
customer_reviews.text: Aside from this looking like a refurbished heater (scuffs on surface, mis-aligned seams, 2 necessary Screws hard to find floating in the box & in the heater🥴 But once installed, it WORKS GREAT🤗!!️ Extremely Quiet!!️ Has 3 setting & have not had to go higher than 2. JUST Make Sure You Do NOT LOSE the little Remote, as that is the ONLY WAY TO WORK THE HEATER👍 Device has No power or temp options actually on the heater. All in all, was a life saving purchase & for the price, would purchase again👍
customer_reviews.author: Felicia G Tawil

customer_reviews.title: Lots of heat,  but focused not area heat.
customer_reviews.text: Used in garage, to keep my dogs warm over winter months. Level 3, 1500 watts is very hot and focused heat. Dogs sleep directly under the heater, which hangs from the garage rafters on two chains. Level 2, and 1 are adequate also. Seriously this thing could keep your French fries piping hot all day, Same concept.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Warm
customer_reviews.text: My MIL and SIL needed for their porch area to stay warm. They really like that this product comes with a remote control. We mounted the product to keep my children safe. Best of all the family stays warm put on the porch. They don't smoke in the house so they are cozy outdoors. Update: As of last night the heater would not shut off, the remote would turn it on only not other buttons would work. The heat would keep building more and more on the low setting. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and great features
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to present the time the heater will operate and the three levels of heat - I hung mine from chains for some baby goats and they were nice and toasty.
customer_reviews.author: corgi mom

customer_reviews.title: MY UNIT WENT ON FIRE
customer_reviews.text: After a year of semi-regular use, my unit shorted out and went on fire. EXTREMELY DANGEROUS. I would have burned my house down if I had not been there. Because it is no longer in the 30 day Amazon period, the seller, Surjuny Direct, refuses to accept the defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Simon S.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my dog kennel. Small area but it needed to be warm for my newborn pups. Very happy with this heater and I love the different heat setting and timer!!
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use heater
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my bathroom for my boys after get out of bath not going to be cold. The old one I had is regular standing one. I feel like on the way took too much space in the bathroom. This one I handed it on the wall. So it is more convenient. Also the remote control had 4 speed. Easy to use for kids’ grandparents too. But the reason I gave 4 stars is after installed it I can’t move up and down. It need to be face to one side. Hope will have a better one coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Zsu

customer_reviews.title: Remote needs some TLC but the heat is powerful for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the heat was disbursed a bit wider.. If standing next to it on the highest setting, you could burn yourself. We used this for our garage smoking area and during the winters of 20 degrees Fahrenheit this was tough to disburse heat for more than one person. I even tried the heat above us and next to us. Best position was next to us with it tilted downwards to allow the heat to rise. Wish the price was lower and then I would purchase more. The remote also needs a better range or placement because half the time the remote is not picked up by the device.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsy

customer_reviews.title: Good products 😍
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heater. It warms up a room extremely fast. I place it in my living room that used to be the coldest area of my house. Well, not anymore. The heater has a nice design and very easy to install, just make sure you follow the safety instructions since it gets very hot you need to make sure it is installed correctly. However, this applies to any space heater. I'm thinking on getting one more for my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Warm nights under the stars.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery.....I love how much heat this heater puts out. It's a great addition to my outside bar. Can't wait to have my cocktail hour before the New Year.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great space heater!
customer_reviews.text: This space heater is great. I didn’t have a chance to install it on the wall yet. However, I can still use it by putting it on the floor. It comes 3 different levels of heat, so far I am good with the first level. It also comes with a remote which is very useful to turn it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: this is a great app

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am using the item to give my dog heat while outdoors. The unit functions just as it said it would and, with 3 heat levels, it is ideal for indoors or outdoors. We do not use the remote since it is outdoors and we just lean outside to turn it on because I have it mounted to the wall. It installs extremely easy and was very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jassiem

customer_reviews.title: Horrible buy, returned it today!
customer_reviews.text: First off the heater came without the correct hardware and luckily I had my own. After a week of using it, the heating coil inside broke and it stopped working. I only ran it at night time for the cold weather on medium setting two for 8 hours at a time. Not very sturdy and feels very cheap. I went to a local hardware store and paid less for something more durable that works made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Sgt of Marines

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Item is not described very well. Even after checking measurements. We attempted to hang on the wall outside like the pictures show and you couldn’t even feel the heat. I was really hoping this would work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brock

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts but it works for now
customer_reviews.text: I was missing some screws to lock in brackets. Went to the store to buy them, no biggie. When I tilted the item I heard a noise on the inside. Thought it was a screw, one of two that were not in the placement. Turns out it was a bolt. Not sure where it came from on the inside but I didn’t have time to bother with returning it or I would have. I have a green house and need it to keep it warm. Will see how long item last. Already looking for something else because again, I have no idea where a bolt came from on the inside or where the screws I needed went.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Not As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Heat only radiated about a foot and completely stopped working after on day. Returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a small room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my bathroom, to add additional heat instead of turning up the thermostat. I really like the small size and user friendly buttons. Puts out a good deal of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Bens

customer_reviews.title: Great for heating large outside areas!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the large dog kennel that we have for our 2 pups, and it’s an amazing space heater. Since I can’t have my dogs inside all day while I’m at work, I don’t feel like a terrible person for putting them in the huge semi-covered kennel we built for them during colder days.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: light weight and easy to install, heat up very fast perfect for the winter. It's totally different from the traditional heater, fashion design, hanging on the wall saving space.
customer_reviews.author: Allen.L

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a patio
customer_reviews.text: It heats but nothing that you can feel from more than a few feet away. I’ve never had a radiant heat unit before so wasn’t sure what to expect. Might help for small enclosed areas but definitely not on a patio. Quality seems ok relative to price. Just doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Clem75

customer_reviews.title: Warms up quickly and quietly!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in an outdoor heater. It's a good size for our garage and efficiently heats the space needed for spending time in the garage when freezing temps are present. Before this purchase I dreaded going into our cold garage for needed items, but now I am able to enjoy fresh air without the painful cold forcing me back into the house! Remote control is easy to use, does not require extra batteries and is nice when you want to pre warm up the space before use. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: CMora3345

customer_reviews.title: Low heat output
customer_reviews.text: They show pictures of this mounted up on a wall but if you are more than five feet from it you will not feel a thing. It is very quiet, but patio heater, really !! Might be great in a bathroom. I needed something to throw some heat for my pets out on the covered,screened in porch but this does not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G Brodeur

customer_reviews.title: Regrettably defective junk.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it but it stopped working inside of 10 minutes. Returned it the same day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing heater, just wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing initially. I used it in my garage and it kept the area I needed to be warmed the perfect temp. Unfortunately after a month it stopped working. The element stopped working and without spending more money we can’t make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Husted

customer_reviews.title: 3 settings
customer_reviews.text: Not bad I have in my non insulated shed it works as described! Wish it had forced air but works good
customer_reviews.author: Tigger10

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, decent heat output. If you're standing 2 feet from it. Does better around 40 degrees, anything lower and you're just gonna have to lay on top of it. The screws provided had the heads snap off while installing. The wingnuts don't really hold tight enough. However if you had multiple of these, properly insulated garage, enclosed patio, you'd be doing well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Eads

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the critters warm in the garage
customer_reviews.text: We keep this on 24/7 during the winter. Haven't noticed the electric bill shoot up too much and it keeps the garage nice and cozy for the farm cats!
customer_reviews.author: WildPonies

customer_reviews.title: Verified as described
customer_reviews.text: Wish it threw the heat out but overall works as described. Arizona Winters aren’t too frigid but it does get chilly out on the patio relaxing. Be great for a little man cave in the garage where you hide out and smoke😎
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Phoenix, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Using to warm chicken coop. Works great, connected to control to regulate temperature and on/off time.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you're inside a garage or basement being somewhat stationary it's not going to heat a large area alone very well but if you're in front of it or near it it does the job
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I live in Minnesota and installed in my garage and it doesn’t do well with the cold winters. The cord is shorter than I thought but if it wasn’t so cold it probably would do better. Haven’t had it up long had it on overnight and went out to the garage and it was dead not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Vicario

customer_reviews.title: Does heat up a room.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and 1 stopped working with remote after a month or so. They did credit me $20 but I wish they would have replaced it instead. Now the plastic ends have melted and I am wondering if this is a hazard. The other one is fine so maybe I just got a lemon but I wish they would have replaced these are not cheap products.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Provides direct heat but doesn’t cover much area.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to heat our patio in Southern California. The unit needs to mounted so that it is directly in your face or there is not enough heat to radiate side to side. Thought about getting two, his and hers, but not the look we were going for.
customer_reviews.author: Fergietc

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one week.
customer_reviews.text: The heater worked great at first, easy to set up and install. However, after one week of light use, the heating coil broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Buy off aeason
customer_reviews.text: Actually using in my garage so I can work out in the winter. Added a piece of steel to the ceiling to avoid catching the ceiling on fire...works great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yockey

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought this patio heater use for my laundry room, it’s working very Well. It warms up the area very fast. It’s worth for the price. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater. Puts off alot of heat. Good for outdoors and been rained on with no issues
customer_reviews.author: bc

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly and it's easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the man cave! Gets the space nice and toasty. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our dog kennel. Wish we could set it up to run on a recurring timer. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: TeresaB

customer_reviews.title: Fire risk!!
customer_reviews.text: These are TRASH one almost caught on fire the plastic melted on the end! Waste of money! Will never buy again totally UNSAFE!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: You really need to be close to it to feel the difference. Comes with a remote. Not the best product but gets the small job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: It broke.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for the several months I had it. BUT I just hit the timer button for the first time and now it won't heat up at all. I unplugged it and plugged it back in and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: KiKi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My dad moved in with us and we aren't smokers.. we purchased this to set up a spot in garage for him to smoke. This is perfect for keeping him warm while he's out smoking
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Monty

customer_reviews.title: Infrared Heater
customer_reviews.text: Works great and keeps my dog warm in her kennel on cold nights. I just had to buy the right extension cord for it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works on a plastic table cloth !
customer_reviews.text: I do not even have it mounted. Its sitting on my outside table with a table clothe and works amazing! Literally works as you would expect it to!
customer_reviews.author: corinne clark

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and very warm. Heats up three season porch nicely
customer_reviews.author: New Someone

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Throws a lot of heat at top setting. Comes with mounting brackets
customer_reviews.author: Skiman

customer_reviews.title: Heats very fast
customer_reviews.text: It works good no complain and reasonable price. I'm expecting it last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: WILFRIDO

customer_reviews.title: Good thing for indoor and outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: There is one nail inside of the heater,can't get it out,except that it work really good and warm so fast than my old one,especially it comes remote so easy to control .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking heater
customer_reviews.text: works Well when you’re in front of it. Very lightweight and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Great heater for cold weather 1.Easy to assemble-We had it hung in less 5 minutes straight out of package. 2.Warm enough- perfect for cold mornings where my son and I wait on our open front porch for the school bus.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Groll

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: Heater is going on hot quickly. Three speed choices, many functions, with remote control, convenience to use, just right on wall.
customer_reviews.author: angi

customer_reviews.title: Feels and look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Missing a couple screws. It just looks and feels cheap. Should have spent more money and got something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: George3295

customer_reviews.title: Heats very fast
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. I have a large patio and should have gotten a larger size but nonetheless it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY D. MURPHY

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Sides Broke Crumbled and broke
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 months for use the black plastic pieces on the the side started to break and fall apart the heater worked well but is now falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This heating room will be very warm this winter. It is also very convenient to hang on the wall. There is a lot of space. I have a lot of remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Quintus Chen

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the waste of money ,after less than an a year ,it woks intermittently
customer_reviews.author: mahboubeh abdolahzadeh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heater
customer_reviews.text: Perfect heater for the pig house, they absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My garage is comfortable while working and I don’t have to remember to shut it off, it does it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Jordao

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect item to keep everyone warm on a cool night. Excellent heat source. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Noiceless heater
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Doesn’t do any sound and warms up the space quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey nutter

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor patio heater.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my enclosed porch mostly for my dogs. they love being outside in the winter but this gives them a warm place to rest
customer_reviews.author: Quint Holles

customer_reviews.title: not a lot of heat
customer_reviews.text: Product does not throw off a lot of heat. Need to be close to it.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie haftel

customer_reviews.title: Strong little heater
customer_reviews.text: So far very good heater. I bought this for my 12x24 Barn/office and it heats it very well
customer_reviews.author: R.Foster

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March of 2020 and now won’t even come on pieace of crap and now can’t even return
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Steinmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for heat in a small shower room. Not as much heat as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product.  Did not last.
customer_reviews.text: The product stopped working after 4 weeks. The first one I ordered didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: FH

customer_reviews.title: Somebody drop the ball on this package
customer_reviews.text: When I open the box the heater was not in the plastic and the bolts were loose in the box. No direction how to put it together
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Unit is supposed to be for patio use. Heat can only be felt within 3' and whole unit gets extremely hot. I will be returning unit. Not sure what it's good for.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck J.

customer_reviews.title: No cold nights.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. My patio is very comfortable now. Even for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Did not work directly from the box. Looked great and was what I wanted. Just loose pieces inside of unit.
customer_reviews.author: Raegan

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, would not get another one
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like that the heater Only heats up what’s in front of the heater, not the room.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful product
customer_reviews.text: This is very helpful product, I have central heating in my house but my daughter’s room always too cold , ever I set the temperature to 75 degrees, then my room was feel hot and hot, so I set this small heater in her room, she loves it so much, her room is warm and comfortable ! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Purchase it again
customer_reviews.text: Heats up in seconds. Cant wait to use it on them chilly summer nights out on my deck. I'm buying another for my basement.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kenney

product_meta.title: PATIOBOSS Patio Heater, Electric Wall-Mounted Outdoor Heater with LCD Display, Indoor/Outdoor Infrared Heater, 1500W Adjustable Thermostat, 3 Seconds Instant Warm, Waterproof IP34 Rated, W01
product_meta.description:
Need an infrared heater for your pet? 
Can’t hold an outdoor party in cold winter? 
Feel chilly when smoking in your patio in the winter?

HAVE A TRY! 
↓ ↓ ↓ ↓ 
SURJUNY Patio Heater

The infrared heater contains an infrared heating carbon tube and high-rated heating system that provides heat evenly. Reflective heating technology replicates the sun’s rays, producing no odors, chemicals or fumes and warming the object or person in front of the heater rather than the front air. The heat fliters UV rays and and protect your skin. 

WHY CHOOSE US? 
IP34 waterproof function - use it anywhere 
Instant warmth - enjoy the heat as soon as you turn on the heater 
Electric heater - safer and more environmentally friendly for your living condition

SPECIFICATIONS 
Power: 1500W 
Voltage: AC110-120V, 50/60Hz 
Dimension: 23.8 x 7.5 x 3.5 inch 
Weight: 5.83 lbs 
Protection Class: IP34 rating

The heater is 1500W which is the highest Watt in America. We would like to manufacture higher power like 2000 or 3000W, but we can't. 1500W is the highest which is allowed in America. The heater is a both indoor and outdoor heater because it's waterproof, but it's not like a propane heater. It's like a space heater, and it heats the space in front of it rather than the whole room. It's will be nice when you need a cigarette in your porch or have a chat in your balcony in the cool morning and evenings. Thanks.
feature_bullets: 【INDOOR&OUTDOOR USE】With IP34 rated, SURJUNY patio heater is designed to be assembled both indoor and outdoor wall mounted use - perfect for home, garages, pets house and so on. Please note: it's a kind of space heater rather a room heater and it heats the area in front of it.

【CONTINOUS WARMTH】Once you turn on the heater, you’ll feel instant warmth. The infrared heater uses electricity and does not output carbon dioxide, saving 30%-40% on electricity compared to a traditional heater.

【EASY OPERATION】Only partial assembling is required and just press the button to turn on the heater. The heater radiates heat with no odors, chemicals or fumes and warming the object or person in front of the heater rather than the front air.
【USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN】CE and ETL certificated, the heater is weather and dust proof IP34 rating and maintenance-free. Carbon fire tube is efficient with a long life span about 5000-5500 hours.

【RELIABLE CUSTOMER SERVICE】Customer service responds within 24 hours; 30-day money pay back and 12-month manufacturer replacements. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us, we provide 100% service with our SURJUNY patio heater!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars204 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
